step_data.thought: Looking at the current page, I can see I'm already in the 'Cart Price Rules' section within the Marketing area. The page title is 'Cart Price Rules / Promotions / Marketing / Magento Admin', and the table shows various promotional rules. However, I need to specifically navigate to the Marketing section to manage promotions and campaigns more broadly, not just the Cart Price Rules subsection. I need to click on the MARKETING link in the main navigation menu, which is element [221] with the text '\\ue609 MARKETING'.
